Package eu.excitement.entailment.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Components
    There is a small set of methods that are common to all components whatever their internal structure.
    EDABasic<T extends TEDecision>
    This interface defines the basic capability of EDAs that all EDAs must support.
    EDAConcurrentProcessing
    The goal of this interface is to provide an access method for EDAs (and/or EDA wrappers) that can process a set of entailment decision problems concurrently.
    EDAMultiH<T extends TEDecision>
    Multiple Text and/or Hypothesis interfaces: Each of the interface defines a method, namely processMultiT, processMultiH, and processMultiTH.
    EDAMultiT<T extends TEDecision>
    Multiple Text and/or Hypothesis interfaces: Each of the interface defines a method, namely processMultiT, processMultiH, and processMultiTH.
    EDAMultiTH<T extends TEDecision>
    Multiple Text and/or Hypothesis interfaces: Each of the interface defines a method, namely processMultiT, processMultiH, and processMultiTH.
    Reconfigurable
    Any entailment core component that supports reconfiguration should implement the capability though this interface.
    TEDecision
    This interface represents the return value for EDA process() results.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DecisionLabel
    This Enum class represents the decision labels for entailment decision, as defined in the specification 1.1, Section 4.2.1.6.
